TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BuildProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义一组用于在 ASP.NET 生成环境中生成源代码的属性和方法。

span.span: Defines a set of properties and methods for generating source code within the ASP.NET build environment.

summary.span: 此类是抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 生成环境使用 对象为应用程序中的不同文件类型生成源代码。The ASP.NET build environment uses objects to generate source code for different file types within an application. 派生自 的类主要提供文件、网页、资源和其他自定义项的源代码。Classes derived from predominantly provide source code for files, Web pages, resources, and other custom items. 通常不会直接创建 类的实例。Typically, you do not create an instance of the class directly. 相反，您实现的类派生自 ，并配置 实现以便在 ASP.NET 生成环境中使用。Instead, you implement a class that derives from , and configure the implementation for use within the ASP.NET build environment. 类的实例与 对象结合使用，以便将一个或多个文件生成到已编译的程序集中。Instances of the class are used with objects to build one or more files into a compiled assembly. 实例以适当的语言为各个文件生成源代码，并且 对象将每个 实例提供的源组合到单个程序集中。A instance generates source code in the appropriate language for individual files, and the object combines the source contributed by each instance into a single assembly. ASP.NET 生成环境使用 类的实例在应用程序内生成文件。The ASP.NET build environment uses instances of the class to build files within an application. 类的 属性指示要生成的文件的路径。The property of the class indicates the path of the file to be built. 应用程序内每个文件的文件扩展名映射到相应的生成提供程序。The file extension of each file within an application is mapped to a corresponding build provider. ASP.NET 生成环境根据文件扩展名为每个文件初始化一个 实例，并使用 方法来生成该文件的源代码。The ASP.NET build environment initializes a instance for each file based on the file extension, and uses the methods to generate source code for the file. 当从一个或多个文件生成程序集时，ASP.NET 生成环境会根据首选编译器语言和文件上下文将 对象传递到 方法，以便 实例可以将其文件的源代码提供给整个程序集。The ASP.NET build environment passes an object based on the preferred compiler language and the context of the file to the methods when building an assembly from one or more files, so that the instance can contribute source code for its file to the overall assembly. 若要为 ASP.NET 应用程序中的文件类型定义自定义生成操作，你必须从 中派生一个类，在派生类中实现成员以生成文件类型，并为应用程序配置文件中的相应文件扩展名配置生成提供程序。To define custom build actions for a file type within an ASP.NET application, you must derive a class from , implement members within the derived class for building the file type, and configure the build provider for the corresponding file extension within the application configuration file. 指定受支持文件的文件扩展名，以及生成提供程序是否支持代码文件、Web 文件、资源文件或所有文件。The specifies the file extension for supported files, and whether the build provider supports code files, Web files, resource files or all files. 使用 `type` 特性指定生成提供程序实现的完全限定类型名称。Use the `type` attribute to specify the fully qualified type name of the build provider implementation. 使用 类指定生成提供程序是应用于 App_Code 目录中的文件，还是应用于 Web 内容目录中的文件、全局或本地资源，还是应用于所有文件。Use the class to specify whether the build provider applies to files in the App_Code directory, to files in a Web content directory, to global or local resources, or to all files. 使用 `extension` 特性来指定用于标识 类支持的文件的文件扩展名。Use the `extension` attribute to specify the file extension used to identify files that the class supports. 使用 类检查配置文件中的生成提供程序。Use the class to examine build providers in a configuration file. 有关配置生成提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[用于编译的 BuildProviders 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384)。For more information about configuring a build provider, see [buildProviders Element for compilation (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384). 若要实现生成自定义文件类型的源代码的生成提供程序，请从 中派生一个类，并重写 方法，以便为支持的文件类型生成源代码。To implement a build provider that generates source code for a custom file type, derive a class from , and override the method to generate source code for the supported file type. 生成的源将以 CodeDOM 图的形式添加到 对象中，或者添加为表示物理源代码文件的内容。The generated source is added to the object in the form of a CodeDOM graph, or as content that represents a physical source code file. 如果生成提供程序需要特定的编程语言，请重写 属性以返回受支持的编程语言的 对象。If the build provider requires a specific programming language, override the property to return a object for the supported programming language. 如果生成提供程序不需要特定编程语言，则不要重写 属性;使用基类实现，这表示生成提供程序可以使用任何 .NET Framework 语言，如 Visual Basic 或 C# 。If the build provider does not require a specific programming language, do not override the property; use the base class implementation, which indicates that the build provider can use any .NET Framework language, such as Visual Basic or C#. 若要实现生成 Web 内容源代码的生成提供程序，请从 中派生一个类，然后重写 方法以返回 生成的类的 。To implement a build provider that generates source code for Web content, derive a class from and override the method to return the for the class generated by . 重写 方法，以便为受支持的文件提供的类型生成源代码。Override the method to generate source code for the type provided by the supported file. > [!NOTE] > 将自定义 类添加到 web.config 文件在 ASP.NET 网站中运行，但不能在 ASP.NET Web 应用程序项目中使用。Adding a customized class to the Web.config file works in an ASP.NET Web site but does not work in an ASP.NET Web application project. 在 Web 应用程序项目中，不能在应用程序中包含由 类生成的代码。In a Web application project, the code that is generated by the class cannot be included in the application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 应用程序项目预编译概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b940abbd-178d-4570-b441-52914fa7b887)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Application Project Precompilation Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b940abbd-178d-4570-b441-52914fa7b887). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的生成提供程序实现，该实现从抽象 基类继承。The following code example illustrates a simple build provider implementation, inheriting from the abstract base class. 生成提供程序会重写基类的 、和 成员。The build provider overrides the , , and members of the base class. 该示例不包括 `SampleClassGenerator` 类的实现。The example does not include the implementation of the `SampleClassGenerator` class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类是抽象类，因此不能使用构造函数直接创建 的实例。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of directly using the constructor. 从 类派生时，重写构造函数以实现生成提供程序实现的自定义初始化操作。When deriving from the class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your build provider implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CodeCompilerType As CompilerType
public: virtual property System::Web::Compilation::CompilerType ^ CodeCompilerType { System::Web::Compilation::CompilerType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示生成提供程序为自定义文件类型生成源代码所使用的编译器类型。

span.span: Represents the compiler type used by a build provider to generate source code for a custom file type.

value.span: 只读 ，表示用于生成虚拟路径的源代码的代码生成器、代码编译器和编译器设置。

span.span: A read-only representing the code generator, code compiler, and compiler settings used to build source code for the virtual path.
The base class returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可提供编译 的实现的源代码的设置。Use the property to provide the settings for compiling source code for an implementation of . 如果生成提供程序不需要特定代码语言来生成和编译源代码，则 `null` 属性。The property is `null` if the build provider does not require a specific code language for generating and compiling source code. 若要在生成提供程序实现中设置 对象的值，请使用 或 方法。To set the value for a object within a build provider implementation, use the or method. 属性指定用于为生成提供程序生成和编译源代码的 实现。The property specifies the implementation that is used to generate and compile source code for a build provider. 属性定义用于将源代码编译为程序集的设置。The property defines the settings that are used to compile the source code into an assembly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的生成提供程序实现，该实现从抽象 基类继承。The following code example illustrates a simple build provider implementation, inheriting from the abstract base class. 生成提供程序会重写基类的 、和 成员。The build provider overrides the , , and members of the base class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

param.span: 引用生成提供程序所生成的源代码的程序集生成器。

span.span: The assembly builder that references the source code generated by the build provider.

summary.span: 为生成提供程序的虚拟路径生成源代码，并将源代码添加到指定程序集生成器。

span.span: Generates source code for the virtual path of the build provider, and adds the source code to a specified assembly builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现生成自定义文件类型的源代码的生成提供程序，请从 类中派生一个类，并重写 方法，以便为支持的文件类型生成源代码。To implement a build provider that generates source code for a custom file type, derive a class from the class, and override the method to generate source code for the supported file type. 通常，生成提供程序的 实现读取 属性、分析内容，并将生成的源代码添加到指定的 对象。Typically, a build provider's implementation reads the property, parses the contents, and adds the generated source code to the specified object. 您可以以 对象或 CodeDOM 图的形式向程序集提供源代码。You can contribute source code to the assembly in the form of a object or a CodeDOM graph. 若要通过 对象将源代码添加到程序集，请使用 方法。To add source code to the assembly through a object, use the method. 若要将 CodeDOM 图中的源代码添加到程序集，请使用 方法。To add source code in a CodeDOM graph to the assembly, use the method. 如果生成提供程序以特定编程语言生成源代码，则必须重写 属性才能返回支持的编程语言的 对象。If the build provider generates source code in a specific programming language, you must override the property to return a object for the supported programming language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的生成提供程序实现，该实现从抽象 基类继承。The following code example illustrates a simple build provider implementation, inheriting from the abstract base class. 生成提供程序会重写基类的 、和 成员。The build provider overrides the , , and members of the base class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可通过 类用于语法突出显示和 Visual Studio 中的设计器支持。This method can be used through the class for syntax highlighting and designer support in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的 方法为输入虚拟路径创建生成提供程序的实例，并对 对象调用 方法。The method of a object creates an instance of a build provider for an input virtual path, and calls the method on the object. Base 类返回 方法的 `null`，指示未实现 。The base class returns `null` for the method, indicating that is not implemented. 某些生成提供程序实现可以实现 来代替 方法。Certain build provider implementations can implement in place of the method. 对象通常使用 来返回虚拟路径的 对象。A object typically uses to return a object for a virtual path. 不过， 方法可用于指示 对象可以从虚拟路径生成多个类型。However, the method can be used to indicate that a object can generate multiple types from a virtual path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType GetDefaultCompilerType() cil managed

summary.span: 返回应用程序中默认语言的编译器设置。

span.span: Returns the compiler settings for the default language in the application.

returns.span: ，表示应用程序中默认语言的编译器设置。

span.span: A that represents the compiler settings for the default language in the application.

returns.span: 基类根据应用程序配置文件返回默认编译器。

span.span: The base class returns the default compiler based on the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法来检查生成提供程序的默认编译器类型。Use the method to examine the default compiler type for a build provider. 使用 方法来检查在生成提供程序中为特定语言名称配置的编译器类型。Use the method to examine the compiler type configured in a build provider for a specific language name. Base 类使用应用程序配置文件的部分中的 `defaultLanguage` 特性值确定默认编译器类型。The base class determines the default compiler type using the `defaultLanguage` attribute value in the section of the application configuration file. 如果编译部分中没有默认的语言设置，则使用 语言提供程序设置默认的编译器类型。If there is no default language setting in the compilation section, the default compiler type is set using the language provider. 从 类派生时，可以使用 在实现中设置 属性。When deriving from the class, you can use to set the property within your implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType GetDefaultCompilerTypeForLanguage(string language) cil managed
Protected Function GetDefaultCompilerTypeForLanguage (language As String) As CompilerType

span.span: A code language name.

summary.span: 根据指定的语言返回生成提供程序的编译器设置。

span.span: Returns the compiler settings for the build provider based on the specified language.

returns.span: ，根据指定的语言表示生成提供程序的编译器设置。

span.span: A that represents the compiler settings for the build provider based on the specified language.

returns.span: 基类根据应用程序配置文件返回该语言的默认编译器设置。

span.span: The base class returns the default compiler settings for the language based on the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法来检查在生成提供程序中为特定语言名称配置的编译器类型。Use the method to examine the compiler type configured in the build provider for a specific language name. 使用 方法来检查生成提供程序的默认编译器类型。Use the method to examine the default compiler type for a build provider. Base 类使用配置文件的 对象的 属性中的 元素确定默认编译器类型。The base class determines the default compiler type using the elements in the property of the object for the configuration file. 这等效于检查和配置文件部分中的元素。This is equivalent to examining the elements in the and the elements in the sections of the configuration file. 例如，对于 `language` 值 VB，基类方法返回一个与 实例的配置设置相对应的 对象。For example, for the `language` value VB, the base class method returns a object that corresponds to the configured settings for an instance of . 从 类派生时，可以使用 为实现支持的语言设置 属性值。When you derive from the class, you can use to set the property value for the language supported by your implementation.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 与生成提供程序的已配置编译器不匹配。

span.span: does not match a configured compiler for the build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现为 Web 内容（如 .aspx 文件）生成源代码的生成提供程序，请从 类中派生一个类，并重写 方法以返回生成提供程序生成的类型。To implement a build provider that generates source code for Web content such as .aspx files, derive a class from the class and override the method to return the type generated by the build provider. ASP.NET 生成系统为每个生成提供程序编译文件，并生成一个 对象，该对象将传递到 方法。The ASP.NET build system compiles files for each build provider, and generates a object, which is passed to the method. 通常，生成提供程序的 实现对输入 `results` 对象的 属性使用 方法以返回提供的类型。Typically, a build provider's implementation uses the method on the property of the input `results` object to return the provided type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 类的实例生成文件并加载已编译的程序集时，ASP.NET 生成环境使用 方法。The method is used by the ASP.NET build environment when using instances of the class to build files and load the compiled assemblies. Base 类方法返回 字段值，指示生成虚拟路径时无需执行任何特殊操作。The base class method returns the field value, indicating that no special action is required when the virtual path is built. 从 类派生时，可以实现 方法，以便为自定义文件类型或虚拟路径返回不同的 值。When deriving from the class, you can implement the method to return a different value for your custom file type or virtual path. 例如，如果重新生成虚拟路径需要重新加载包含的 对象，则可以从 方法返回 枚举值。For example, if a rebuild of your virtual path requires the containing object to be reloaded, you can return the enumeration value from your method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对返回的 对象使用 方法，读取 对象的 属性的内容。Use the method on the returned object to read the contents of the property for a object. 调用 方法后，必须使用 方法关闭 对象并释放关联的系统资源。After calling the method, you must use the method to close the object and free associated system resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对返回的 对象使用 方法可读取虚拟路径的内容。Use the method on the returned object to read the contents of the virtual path. 调用 方法后，必须使用 方法关闭 对象并释放关联的系统资源。After calling the method, you must use the method to close the object and free associated system resources.

returns.span: 打开的 ，可用于读取 的内容。

span.span: An open that can be used to read the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对返回的 对象使用 方法可读取 对象的虚拟路径的内容。Use the method on the returned object to read the contents of the virtual path for the object. 调用 方法后，必须使用 方法关闭 对象并释放关联的系统资源。After calling the method, you must use the method to close the object and free associated system resources.

span.span: The virtual path to read.

summary.span: 打开流以从指定的虚拟路径读取。

span.span: Opens a stream for reading from a specified virtual path.

returns.span: 打开的 ，可用于读取指定的虚拟路径的内容。

span.span: An open that can be used to read the contents of the specified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对返回的 对象使用 方法可读取虚拟路径的内容。Use the method on the returned object to read the contents of the virtual path. 调用 方法后，必须使用 方法关闭 对象并释放关联的系统资源。After calling the method, you must use the method to close the object and free associated system resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessCompileErrors(class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults results) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub ProcessCompileErrors (results As CompilerResults)
abstract member ProcessCompileErrors : System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults -> unit override this.ProcessCompileErrors : System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults -> unit

span.span: Compiler results.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，能够查看编译器错误消息，以便将其修改为提供更多信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, enables you to review compiler error messages so that you can modify them to provide more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您可以重写此方法，以便您可以在显示编译器错误之前修改它们以使错误文本对用户更有帮助。You typically override this method so that you can modify compiler errors before they are displayed in order to make the error text more helpful to the user. 如果你知道某些错误的上下文，并且可以向用户提供有关如何修复这些错误的信息，这会很有用。This is useful in scenarios where you know the context of certain errors and can provide information to the user about how to fix them. 原始编译器错误消息通常特定于特定的语言构造，可能无法使真实原因或解决方案对用户明显。The original compiler error message is usually specific to a particular language construct and might not make the real cause or solution obvious to the user. 您可以通过使用传递给方法的 对象来访问这些错误。You can access the errors by using the object that is passed to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ReferencedAssemblies As ICollection
protected: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ ReferencedAssemblies { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 表示要用生成提供程序生成的源代码进行编译的程序集。

span.span: Represents the assemblies to compile with the source generated by the build provider.

value.span: 程序集的只读集合，可由生成提供程序生成的源代码引用。

span.span: A read-only collection of assemblies that can be referenced by the source code generated by the build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 生成环境初始化可供生成提供程序引用的程序集的集合。The ASP.NET build environment initializes the collection of assemblies that are available for reference by the build provider. 生成提供程序生成的源代码可以使用引用的程序集中的公共类型。The source code generated by a build provider can use public types in the referenced assemblies. 引用的程序集集合包含在 ASP.NET 应用程序中生成的其他程序集，以及配置文件的元素中列出的程序集。The referenced assembly collection consists of other assemblies built in the ASP.NET application, and assemblies listed in the element in the configuration file. 如果生成提供程序生成引用其他程序集的源代码，则生成提供程序使用 方法添加其他程序集。If the build provider generates source code that references additional assemblies, the build provider adds the additional assemblies using the method. ASP.NET 生成环境使用由生成提供程序添加的引用的程序集和可供引用的程序集的默认集合来解析程序集编译过程中的外部类型。The ASP.NET build environment resolves external types during assembly compilation using both the referenced assemblies added by build providers and the default collection of assemblies available for reference. 集合不包含通过 方法添加以供其他生成提供程序引用的程序集。The collection does not include assemblies that are added for reference by other build providers through the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void RegisterBuildProvider (string extension, Type providerType);
.method public static hidebysig void RegisterBuildProvider(string extension, class System.Type providerType) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterBuildProvider (extension As String, providerType As Type)
public: static void RegisterBuildProvider(System::String ^ extension, Type ^ providerType);
static member RegisterBuildProvider : string * Type -> unit

param.name: extension
param.span: 生成提供程序所针对的文件扩展名。

span.span: The file-name extension that the build provider is for.
The build provider class.

summary.span: 注册一个生成提供程序。

span.span: Registers a build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来注册生成提供程序，而不是在 web.config 文件中定义它们。You can use this method to register build providers instead of defining them in the Web.config file. 有关生成提供程序的详细信息，请参阅 类和[用于编译的 BuildProviders 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384)。For more information about build providers, see the class and [buildProviders Element for compilation (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384).

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Friend ReadOnly Property VirtualPath As String
protected public: property System::String ^ VirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示要由此生成提供程序实现生成的文件。

span.span: Represents the file to be built by this build provider implementation.

value.span: 只读字符串，指定要由此生成提供程序编译的文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: A read-only string that specifies the virtual path of a file to be compiled by this build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的虚拟路径是由生成提供程序编译的文件的路径。The virtual path of a object is the path to the file that is being compiled by the build provider. 例如，如果你已将自定义 类配置为使用. abc 的自定义扩展来生成网站中的所有文件，如果你的网站名为 WebSite1，并且该网站包含一个名为 abc 的文件，则 属性包含 `/WebSite1/Example.abc`的值。For example, if you have configured a custom class to build all files in the Web site with the custom extension of .abc, if your Web site is named WebSite1, and the Web site contains a file named Example.abc, the property contains the value `/WebSite1/Example.abc`. 应用程序内每个文件的文件扩展名决定文件类型和文件类型对应的生成提供程序。The file extension of each file within the application determines the file type, and the corresponding build provider for the file type. ASP.NET 生成环境根据文件类型为每个文件初始化一个 对象，并使用 方法为每个文件生成源。The ASP.NET build environment initializes a object for each file based on the file type, and uses the methods to generate source for each file. 有关配置生成提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[用于编译的 BuildProviders 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384)。For more information about configuring a build provider, see [buildProviders Element for compilation (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property VirtualPathDependencies As ICollection
public: virtual property System::Collections::ICollection ^ VirtualPathDependencies { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示在生成提供程序生成代码之前必须生成的虚拟路径的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of virtual paths that must be built before the build provider generates code.

value.span: 字符串的只读集合，表示生成提供程序的该实例依赖的虚拟路径。

span.span: A read-only collection of strings, representing the virtual paths that this instance of the build provider is dependent on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个虚拟路径的集合，必须在 实例生成源代码之前编译这些路径。The property is a collection of virtual paths that must be compiled before the instance generates source code. 中的虚拟路径中的程序集作为对 实例的编译的引用添加。The assemblies from the virtual paths in are added as references to the compilation for the instance.
